argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lincval1.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lincval1.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 3 |  | lincval1.r | |- R = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | lincval1.f | |- F = { <. V , ( 0g ` S ) >. } |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` S ) = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_lmod0cl | |- ( M e. LMod -> ( 0g ` S ) e. R ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( 0g ` S ) e. R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` M ) = ( .s ` M ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 8, 4 | #P_lincvalsn | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B /\ ( 0g ` S ) e. R ) -> ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( ( 0g ` S ) ( .s ` M ) V ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( ( 0g ` S ) ( .s ` M ) V ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` M ) = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 8, 5, 11 | #P_lmod0vs | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( ( 0g ` S ) ( .s ` M ) V ) = ( 0g ` M ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. B ) -> ( F ( linC ` M ) { V } ) = ( 0g ` M ) ) |
